code: import React from'react';import StatCard from'../Common/StatCard';import TransactionList from'../Transactions/TransactionList';import RiskChart from'../Analytics/RiskChart';import{AlertTriangle,Shield,Clock,TrendingUp,DollarSign}from'lucide-react';import'./Dashboard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=_ref=>{let{stats,transactions}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Fraud Detection Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Real-time monitoring and analytics for financial transactions"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stats-grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StatCard,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Shield,{size:24}),title:"Total Transactions",value:stats.totalTransactions.toLocaleString(),change:"+12.4%",trend:"up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StatCard,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AlertTriangle,{size:24}),title:"Fraud Detected",value:stats.fraudDetected,change:"+5.2%",trend:"up",variant:"danger"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StatCard,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Clock,{size:24}),title:"Avg Response Time",value:"".concat(stats.avgResponseTime,"ms"),change:"-8.7%",trend:"down"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StatCard,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TrendingUp,{size:24}),title:"Accuracy Rate",value:stats.accuracyRate,change:"+2.1%",trend:"up",variant:"success"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RiskChart,{transactions:transactions})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"recent-transactions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Recent Transactions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"view-all",children:"View All"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TransactionList,{transactions:transactions,limit:8})]})]})]});};export default Dashboard;
